name: Charge Jam, Charging Man
description:
A new version of my Piskel  design 

but the same mechanics,  the super speed spinning  

You are a Man/Monster charging your way to the end of this world. 

Arrow Keys for movement 

Space for Jump 

 but it is more fun just to use the arrow keys. The goals is to make it to the end of the map without getting killed or flying out of the world.
